abstract: InvenSense, which makes motion sensing solutions for mobile applications, has taken $19 million Series C in a round led by Sierra Ventures, with previous investors Artiman Ventures, Partech International and Qualcomm Ventures also participating.
lead_paragraph: InvenSense, which makes motion sensing solutions for mobile applications, has taken $19 million Series C in a round led by Sierra Ventures, with previous investors Artiman Ventures, Partech International and Qualcomm Ventures also participating.

headline.main: InvenSense Feels the Love from V.C.’s
